link:reference.tech.01.02:Act: Spreading the Benefits of the Boom Legislation Amendment (Loss Carry-back) Bill 2012
link:reference.tech.01.02:FullReferenceText: Spreading the Benefits of the Boom Legislation Amendment (Loss Carry-back) Bill 2012 has not yet been passed by Parliament. It proposes a variation to Division 160 of the Income Tax Assessment Act 1997.
